thread.title: Bradley Cooper's 'Engagement' to Amy Schumer Was Supposed to be a Secret
thread.title_full: Bradley Cooper's 'Engagement' to Amy Schumer Was Supposed to be a Secret

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: Bradley Cooper's 'Engagement' to Amy Schumer Was Supposed to be a Secret
text:
​​Now that Amy Schumer went ahead and revealed her "engagement" to Bradley Cooper on ​Saturday Night Live ​last weekend , the star has broken his silence on their passionate romance. ​
"I thought it was gonna be a secret, but she just decided to let the cat out of the bag," Bradley quipped on ​ Access Hollywood . ​
"I texted with her after," Bradley added, which is what you do with your betrothed. "I was like, 'That was hilarious.'"
 For Amy, Bradley has always been a source of comedic material. "The truth is, I remember I met her, and then she was on a talk show and made up some story that I pretended to avoid her," he explained, proving that even Bradley Cooper and Amy Schumer flirt like middle schoolers.
We wish them every happiness. And have our fingers crossed that they make a movie about it all in which Jennifer Lawrence plays the maid of honor.
​
